mainSequence.step: User enters username and password on Login Page
User submits login form on Login Page
Login Page sends HTTP POST /login with credentials to Auth Controller
Auth Controller authenticates user credentials using Auth Service
Auth Service checks user credentials in User Repository
User Repository queries user credentials in Database
Database returns user details to User Repository
User Repository returns user details to Auth Service
Auth Service returns user details to Auth Controller
Auth Controller redirects to Home Page
Home Page loads for the User
Home Page displays the home page to the User
